caseTitle: Malik Umar Aslam Awan v. Mst. Sumaira Malik, etc
tagline: The Court could intervene in the election of such candidates, who were found to be disqualified, even after having been elected as members of Parliament, and their election could subsequently be de-notified. The Member of Parliament was disqualified on account of possession of educational degree obtained by forgery, impersonation and dishonest means.
